comment: Lemma 2 for ~ frgrwopreg . If the set ` A ` of vertices of degree ` K ` is not empty in a friendship graph with at least two vertices, then ` K ` must be greater than 1 . This is only an observation, which is not required for the proof the friendship theorem. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 2-Jan-2022.)
